Name: aMAZEd
About the game: Wake up in a narrow corridor to quickly realize you're all alone and utterly lost. Escape the dungeons - overcome many traps, solve puzzles, search for useful items and try to avoid the monster following your every step as you try to escape the labyrinth. But what if there's something worse than the monster? What about hungry zombies? Will you fight back?
Meta Title: aMAZEd: Aug 31, 2020, Ondřej Hladík and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on aMAZEd? Check out the release date (Aug 31, 2020), developer insights from Ondřej Hladík, and a complete game summary.
